title: Does dodging count as losing a placement?
body: I got one of those "I am intentionally feeding just because fuck you" people in my champ select and dodged , please tell me this doesn't count as placement loss as up until now I have been doing pretty damn well in my placements.

replies.body:
No it doesn't.


Source: experience

During season 3, i dodged 2 games and didn't count as loss.

Dodging does nothing apart from give you a dodge queue penalty, dodging has never made you lose MMR.

Anyone who tells you it does is a moron.

I have searched around and the opinion seems to be split some people say it counts as a loss and some people say its 10 games played no matter what, my games played didn't actually go up but some people say this is a visual bug I don't know can't find any solid answer.

Yeah, i think you still have to play 10 games which is weird. I wonder if you dodge 10 times what would happen.

Lots of people saying they dodged a few games, but had to play 10 to get a rank (but their ranking may have been affected by the dodges). Who knows.

EDIT: reading everywhere that Dodges in placements the system counts as a normal ranked game dodge, so you lose 3LP. But since you have no LP yet it doesnt matter LOL

Dodge away.
You could just look at your profile and see if it counted.
